options.A: Dopamine agonist

options.A: PARK1 (α-synuclein)

options.A: Levodopa

question_text: What will confirm the diagnosis of Wilson's disease?

options.A: Liver biopsy

options.A: Liver biopsy

question_text: For a patient with dyt11, what is the first-line treatment if the condition improves with alcohol?

options.A: Clonazepam
